meanings.sent1: The alley looked even sketchier at night.
meanings.sent2: The old bridge seemed sketchier than the new one.
meanings.sent3: I wouldn't trust that sketchier-looking ice cream truck.
meanings.sent4: The stranger's smile seemed even sketchier under the dim streetlight.
meanings.sent5: The creaky floorboards made the old house feel even sketchier.

meanings.definition: Of poor quality or suspicious appearance
meanings.sent1: The sketchier painting was quickly dismissed by the art critic.
meanings.sent2: The sketchier products were placed on the clearance shelf.
meanings.sent3: The sketchier-looking clown made the children giggle nervously.
meanings.sent4: The sketchier fabric unraveled after just one wash.
meanings.sent5: The sketchier car dealership had dusty, old vehicles on display.

meanings.definition: To make a rough drawing or outline of something
meanings.sent1: She quickly sketched a sketchier version of the landscape.
meanings.sent2: He sketched a sketchier map to show the general direction.
meanings.sent3: The artist decided to sketchier the scene in just five minutes.
meanings.sent4: The detective sketched a sketchier profile of the suspect.
meanings.sent5: I tried to sketch a sketchier portrait of my dog, but it ended up looking like a cat.
